Title: Bird Feeder Log
Notes: This was a log my parents gave me that I returned in the hope it would attract birds which my mum loves to see in the garden.

Title: Vase
Notes: My very first commission to display some lego flowers for my mother in law.

Title: Anniversary Vase
Notes: A present for an anniversary filled with some knitted flowers.

Title: Howling Wolf
Notes: This was my first and thus far only experiment with resin I display. Routed the shape and then filled with a glow in the dark resin makes this really pop when the lights are offs to.

Title: Woodpecker
Notes: An attempt at connecting different turns with turned dowels. Not bad for a first go and will try again.
